content:
{"name": "St. Christine Christian Services", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Shoppers present at 11:00 a.m. with identification that shows they are 70 or older (“Seniors”) will be given a red card and allowed to get in the pantry line. Others in line at 11am will be given a green card to line up after the Seniors. Red and green cards will not be given to those coming to the line after 11. They will line up as they arrive.
Shoppers must bring your own pull cart, canvas bag, duffle bag, suitcase, cooler, or wagon. No grocery carts are allowed in the pantry.
ZIP Code Restrictions will return as pre-pandemic. We only serve Zip Codes 48223 and 48219.  ID with zip code is required.  ID with zip code will be required.
We are currently distributing hot meals every Tuesday beginning at noon and continuing until the meals are gone (usually less than two hours). Kids and to-go meals are also available. 
", "email": "", "url": "https://sccsdetroit.org/food-pantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "22261 Fenkell Avenue", "address_2": "", "city": "Brightmoor", "state_province": "MI", "postal_code": "48223", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.4000343, "longitude": -83.2602601}, "phones": [{"number": "(313) 543-1527", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "05:00", "closes_at": "19:30"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Zip code restrictions"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}]}
